titleStmt.title: The French King's declaration, that the children of those of the pretended reformed religion may change their religion at the age of seven years with a prohibition that those of the said religion may not send their children to be bred in forreign countries : registred in Parliament the 8th day of July new stile, 1681. and printed at Paris.
Declaration du Roy, portant que les enfant de la religion pretendue reformée pourront se convetir à l'âge de sept ans. English
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)

titleStmt.title: The French King's declaration, that the children of those of the pretended reformed religion may change their religion at the age of seven years with a prohibition that those of the said religion may not send their children to be bred in forreign countries : registred in Parliament the 8th day of July new stile, 1681. and printed at Paris.
Declaration du Roy, portant que les enfant de la religion pretendue reformée pourront se convetir à l'âge de sept ans. English
